A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
JJ Abrams had set up an easy slam dunk for this film\, and Disney completely blew it.
The Last Jedi is full of plot holes\, under developed characters\, and had far too much humour with terrible timing.  Overall it was the worst depiction and worst sort of betrayal to one of the most beloved and developed characters in the franchise - Luke.

The Last Jedi completely failed to build or develop on the excellent movie The Force Awakens.  How a big-budget film such as this could be made so poorly is way beyond me\, especially after the success of The Force Awakens and Rogue One.
